title: Hana ni Kedamono
overview: Kumi joins a prestigious high school as a transfer student where she meets a handsome and kind boy called Hyo. During her time there, she falls in love and has her first kiss with him, however what she didn't know was that Hyo is famous for being a womanizer at school. After she discovers this, she feels betrayed, but even then, her feelings for him don't go away.
